ygData.subject: Re: Protest
ygData.msgSnippet: We should all send an e-mail to verant unless they are listining on our chat... Lez see Everyone send an e-mail to em :-) The Wanderer ... === The Wanderer May
ygData.messageBody:
We should all send an e-mail to verant unless they are
listining on our chat...
Lez see
Everyone send an e-mail to em :-)
The Wanderer

--- kng@... wrote:
> From: kng@...
>
> I aggree with this protest. I have been getting
> frustrated with the Enchanters myself though I still
> play them. Verant wants this to be a team game the
> only problem is (which I run into alot) is that how
> are we suppose to team and fight things that are a
> challenge? When I am in a group and we fight
> something red I become useless I can't cast on them
> so I have to go in and tank with everyone else and
> have my pet help me at times. If this is how I
> wanted to play I would play a Shadow Knight. I have
> a hard enough time trying to cast on things that are
> blue too me. I even have things that are green to
> me resist my spells at times. I think they should
> fix this also. alteast make Tashan help more if you
> cast it you should be able to cast on res things.
>
> To clear up the spell stunning issue. In a patch
> about 3 weeks ago they had a post on the patch
> server and the news section that said. Spells that
> were to Stun (ie. Chaotic Feedback, Sanity Warp,
> Smite a Cleric spell line and others) will instead
> interupt the targets casting. I would rather it
> stun since these spells take sooooo long to cast as
> it is and Colour Flux is better for this.
>
> They do need to do some serious work on the
> Enchanter to make them a some what playable race.
> With every patch something seems to get worse with
> them. Illusions broken (I know it was a accident
> but it still took them about 2 weeks to fix it)
> which is a major part of a enchanter. They also
> need to add some sort of enchant weapon and if it is
> in the game now hidding it will be useless by the
> time you are level 16 to 20 since you will either
> have money to buy a weapon or you can go find a
> magic weapon by this level. Also fixing Jewel
> crafting would be nice since it is a joke right now
> 150 plat to make a +3 int item where I can get a
> braclet at mid twentys that give 3 int and wiz.
>
> Also a question what books tell what pages make
> which spells?
>
> I hope that this clears up the Stun issue and
> everyone needs to protest to make this worth while.
>
>
>
> Kryten of ECI
>
>

>

The Wanderer
May The Wanderers Protect You
